compute_indexes module

compute_indexes.compute_indexes_(polygons, src, output_dir, output_name)

This function orchestrate the use of the indexes functions (defined in indexes_func.py)

Parameters:

  • polygons – Vectorial data read by geopandas/shapely

  • src – raster data read by rasterio

  • output_dir – the directory in which to save the output vectorial data (the code get it from the .json param file)

  • output_name – the name of the output layer (the code get it from the .json param file)

Returns:

nothing but save the vectorial data as shapefile in the output directory
